definition: a reflex motion caused by cold or fear or excitement, shake, as from cold
details:
noun
- a reflex motion caused by cold or fear or excitement
= synonyms: shake
- an almost pleasurable sensation of fright
= synonyms: shudder
verb
- shake, as from cold
= example: shake, as from cold
= synonyms: shudder
- tremble convulsively, as from fear or excitement
= synonyms: shudder
